summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1658, for the improvement of the alley in block 4, University Heights Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 14th Avenue Northeast and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 17540 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
